mapper.insert: insert into collectionRev(seq, revSeq, userId, nickName, revComment, revCount , revStar) values(#{seq}, nextval('revSeq'), #{userId}, #{nickName}, #{revComment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revCount}, #{revStar})
mapper.select: select * from collectionRev where seq = #{seq} or revSeq = #{revSeq}
mapper.update: update collectionRev set revComment = #{revComment}, revStar = #{revStar}, reviewDate = now() where revSeq = #{revSeq}
mapper.select: select * from(select seq, revSeq, userId, nickName, revComment, revCount, revStar, reviewDate from collectionRev)as reviewPaging where seq = #{seq} order by revSeq desc limit #{cri.pageNumForLimit},12
